#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>  
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	int T;
	string s1,s2;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		cin>>s1>>s2;
		sort(s1.begin(),s1.end());
		sort(s2.begin(),s2.end());
		if(s1==s2)
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	}
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
